squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators

Class LayoutGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators.LayoutGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILayoutGenerator

    public class LayoutGenerator
extends Object
implements ILayoutGenerator
    The default and reference implementation of an ILayoutGenerator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping
      Maps 'keyLevel' to the set of rooms within that keyLevel.
      protected static class  LayoutGenerator.OutOfRoomsException 
      protected static class  LayoutGenerator.RetryException
      Thrown by several ILayoutGenerator methods that can fail.

      • EDGE_COUNT_COMPARATOR

        protected static final Comparator<Room> EDGE_COUNT_COMPARATOR
        Comparator objects for sorting Rooms in a couple of different ways. These are used to determine in which rooms of a given keyLevel it is best to place the next key.
        See Also:
        placeKeys(squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators.LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping)

      • INTENSITY_COMPARATOR

        protected static final Comparator<Room> INTENSITY_COMPARATOR
        Comparator objects for sorting Rooms in a couple of different ways. These are used to determine in which rooms of a given keyLevel it is best to place the next key.
        See Also:
        placeKeys(squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.locks.generators.LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping)

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutGenerator

        public LayoutGenerator(RNG rng,
                       ILayoutConstraints constraints)
        Creates a LayoutGenerator with a given random seed and places specific constraints on IRoomLayouts it generates.
        Parameters:
        rng - the random number generator to use
        constraints - the constraints to place on generation
        See Also:
        ILayoutConstraints

    • Method Detail

      • chooseRoomWithFreeEdge

        protected Room chooseRoomWithFreeEdge(Collection<Room> roomCollection,
                                      int keyLevel)
        Randomly chooses a Room within the given collection that has at least one adjacent empty space.
        Parameters:
        roomCollection - the collection of rooms to choose from
        Returns:
        the room that was chosen, or null if there are no rooms with adjacent empty spaces

      • chooseFreeEdge

        protected int chooseFreeEdge(Room room,
                             int keyLevel)
        Randomly chooses a Direction in which the given Room has an adjacent empty space.
        Parameters:
        room - the room
        Returns:
        the Direction of the empty space chosen adjacent to the Room or null if there are no adjacent empty spaces

      • initEntranceRoom

        protected void initEntranceRoom(LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping levels)
                         throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Sets up the dungeon's entrance room.
        Parameters:
        levels - the keyLevel -> room-set mapping to update
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        See Also:
        LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping

      • shouldAddNewLock

        protected boolean shouldAddNewLock(int keyLevel,
                                   int numRooms,
                                   int targetRoomsPerLock)
        Decides whether to add a new lock (and keyLevel) at this point.
        Parameters:
        keyLevel - the number of distinct locks that have been placed into the map so far
        numRooms - the number of rooms at the current keyLevel
        targetRoomsPerLock - the number of rooms the generator has chosen as the target number of rooms to place at each keyLevel (which subclasses can ignore, if desired).

      • placeRooms

        protected void placeRooms(LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping levels,
                          int roomsPerLock)
                   throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException,
                          LayoutGenerator.OutOfRoomsException
        Fill the dungeon's space with rooms and doors (some locked). Keys are not inserted at this point.
        Parameters:
        levels - the keyLevel -> room-set mapping to update
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if it fails
        LayoutGenerator.OutOfRoomsException
        See Also:
        LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping

      • placeBossGoalRooms

        protected void placeBossGoalRooms(LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping levels)
                           throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Places the BOSS and GOAL rooms within the dungeon, in existing rooms. These rooms are moved into the next keyLevel.
        Parameters:
        levels - the keyLevel -> room-set mapping to update
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if it fails
        See Also:
        LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping

      • removeDescendantsFromList

        protected void removeDescendantsFromList(List<Room> rooms,
                                         Room room)
        Removes the given Room and all its descendants from the given list.
        Parameters:
        rooms - the list of Rooms to remove nodes from
        room - the Room whose descendants to remove from the list

      • addPrecond

        protected void addPrecond(Room room,
                          Condition cond)
        Adds extra conditions to the given Room's preconditions and all of its descendants.
        Parameters:
        room - the Room to add extra preconditions to
        cond - the extra preconditions to add

      • switchLockChildRooms

        protected boolean switchLockChildRooms(Room room,
                                       Condition.SwitchState givenState)
        Randomly locks descendant rooms of the given Room with Edges that require the switch to be in the given state.

        If the given state is EITHER, the required states will be random.

        Parameters:
        room - the room whose child to lock
        givenState - the state to require the switch to be in for the child rooms to be accessible
        Returns:
        true if any locks were added, false if none were added (which can happen due to the way the random decisions are made)
        See Also:
        Condition.SwitchState

      • getSolutionPath

        protected List<Room> getSolutionPath()
        Returns a path from the goal to the dungeon entrance, along the 'parent' relations.
        Returns:
        a list of linked Rooms starting with the goal room and ending with the start room.

      • placeSwitches

        protected void placeSwitches()
                      throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Makes some Edges within the dungeon require the dungeon's switch to be in a particular state, and places the switch in a room in the dungeon.
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if it fails

      • graphify

        protected void graphify()
                 throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Randomly links up some adjacent rooms to make the dungeon graph less of a tree.
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if it fails

      • placeKeys

        protected void placeKeys(LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping levels)
                  throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Places keys within the dungeon in such a way that the dungeon is guaranteed to be solvable.
        Parameters:
        levels - the keyLevel -> room-set mapping to use
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if it fails
        See Also:
        LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping

      • applyIntensity

        protected double applyIntensity(Room room,
                                double intensity)
        Recursively applies the given intensity to the given Room, and higher intensities to each of its descendants that are within the same keyLevel.

        Intensities set by this method may (will) be outside of the normal range from 0.0 to 1.0. See normalizeIntensity() to correct this.

        Parameters:
        room - the room to set the intensity of
        intensity - the value to set intensity to (some randomn variance is added)
        See Also:
        Room

      • normalizeIntensity

        protected void normalizeIntensity()
        Scales intensities within the dungeon down so that they all fit within the range 0 <= intensity < 1.0.
        See Also:
        Room

      • computeIntensity

        protected void computeIntensity(LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping levels)
                         throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Computes the 'intensity' of each Room. Rooms generally get more intense the deeper they are into the dungeon.
        Parameters:
        levels - the keyLevel -> room-set mapping to update
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if it fails
        See Also:
        LayoutGenerator.KeyLevelRoomMapping, Room

      • checkAcceptable

        protected void checkAcceptable()
                        throws LayoutGenerator.RetryException
        Checks with the ILayoutConstraints that the dungeon is OK to use.
        Throws:
        LayoutGenerator.RetryException - if the ILayoutConstraints decided generation must be re-attempted
        See Also:
        ILayoutConstraints

        Generates a new IRoomLayout.

        Gets the most recently generated IRoomLayout.
